items.content_html: A lightweight command-line interface for simulating and solving Kuhn Poker. Designed for studying optimal strategies, evaluating decisions, and learning basic game theory through a simplified poker variant.

items.content_html: A lightweight MCP server that fetches real-time weather data from OpenWeather.org based on city names. Built with @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, this tool allows LLM-based agents (like those in Cursor IDE) to retrieve current weather conditions such as temperature, humidity, wind speed, and pressure.
items.title: HarshilDoshi153/mcp-weather-server: A lightweight MCP server that fetches real-time weather data from OpenWeather.org based on city names. Built with @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, this tool allows LLM-based agents (like those in Cursor IDE) to retrieve current weather conditions such as temperature, humidity, wind speed, and pressure.

items.content_html: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.
items.title: Santhosh785/MilkMate: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
